page.title: 11A SCHOOLCHILD'S DAY
page.content: Hannah is a seven and a half year old girl. Who goes to a school called Horsington Primary school.She has to wear a uniform,which she is not too keen on.Her favorite lessons are Maths and English.The lesson she does not like is writing up programs she has watched. She enjoyes doing her homework.After her homework she watches television. Hannah gets up at about seven o'clock and gets to school about nine.She takes a pack lunch, she travels to and from school by car.She likes sitting by the heater in the classroom, she has a lot of friends and likes to play with them at school and at home.She enjoys her homework and then watches television.She usually goes to bed at about seven fifteen.
